[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@3rdweb/sdk](./sdk.md) &gt; [VoteContract](./sdk.votecontract.md)

## VoteContract class

Create a decentralized organization for token holders to vote on proposals.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare class VoteContract implements UpdateableNetwork 
```
<b>Implements:</b> UpdateableNetwork

## Example


```javascript
import { ThirdwebSDK } from "@3rdweb/sdk";

// You can switch out this provider with any wallet or provider setup you like.
const provider = ethers.Wallet.createRandom();
const sdk = new ThirdwebSDK(provider);
const contract = sdk.getVoteContract("{{contract_address}}");
```

## Constructors

|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(network, address, storage, options, contractWrapper)](./sdk.votecontract._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>VoteContract</code> class |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [balance()](./sdk.votecontract.balance.md) |  | Check the balance of the project wallet in the native token of the chain |
|  [balanceOfToken(tokenAddress)](./sdk.votecontract.balanceoftoken.md) |  | Check the balance of the project wallet in a particular ERC20 token contract |
|  [canExecute(proposalId)](./sdk.votecontract.canexecute.md) |  | Can Execute |
|  [execute(proposalId)](./sdk.votecontract.execute.md) |  | Execute Proposal |
|  [get(proposalId)](./sdk.votecontract.get.md) |  | Get a proposal by id. |
|  [getAddress()](./sdk.votecontract.getaddress.md) |  |  |
|  [getAll()](./sdk.votecontract.getall.md) |  | Get All Proposals |
|  [getProposalVotes(proposalId)](./sdk.votecontract.getproposalvotes.md) |  | Get the votes for a specific proposal |
|  [hasVoted(proposalId, account)](./sdk.votecontract.hasvoted.md) |  | Check If Wallet Voted |
|  [onNetworkUpdated(network)](./sdk.votecontract.onnetworkupdated.md) |  |  |
|  [propose(description, executions)](./sdk.votecontract.propose.md) |  | Create Proposal |
|  [settings()](./sdk.votecontract.settings.md) |  | Get the Vote contract configuration |
|  [vote(proposalId, voteType, reason)](./sdk.votecontract.vote.md) |  | Vote |
